messages.title: Bridget's pledges to you
messages.content: I love our area, I've lived in Islington for nearly 20 years. My Granddad even ran a shop on City Road. I will always fight for local people - like when I led the campaign that saved the Essex Road Post Office.

messages.title: Pledge 1
messages.content: I will be a hardworking local MP and will always put our area - and not party politics - first.

messages.title: Pledge 2
messages.content: I joined thousands of local people to march against the Iraq war - I will never vote for an illegal war.

messages.title: Pledge 3
messages.content: Like you, I live here in Islington. I'll never claim a penny for my housing, only for the cost of serving you.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight for local people like when she led the campaign that saved the Essex Road Post Office.
Joined thousands of local people to march against the Iraq war and will never vote for an illegal war.
Will put area first before party politics and will not claim housing expenses.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Elections in here are always a close race between the Lib Dems and Labour. The Conservatives and Green Party are out of the race and can't win here.

community.content: I will always fight for local people like when I led the campaign that saved the Essex Road Post Office.

examples: Labour MPs voted to close our local Post Offices.
Labour MPs voted against plans to get more police on our streets.
Labour MPs voted for the Iraq war.
